title: Q&A with enjoi rider Didrik Galasso
content:
As part of our Old School box we were proud to include the Tummy Stick Rails by Enjoi.

Letâ€™s start with a bit of history for the younger ones among us: in the early and mid 80â€™s almost every skateboarder used board rails. Some of the old rats even argue that â€œit was considered more punk/hardcore to not use rails, for example none of the Alva guys had themâ€. The rails went out of fashion in the early 90â€™s and from there we haven’t really experienced any comebackâ€¦ until now.

enjoi Tummy Stick Rails

There are basically two main reasons for using rails: it feels way better for your board slides (and we can tell these ones slide very well) and itâ€™s nice for grabs. You have to keep in mind the rationale behind them: back in the days, skateboarders were mostly sliding some concrete coping (and you can imagine that pool coping was not as smooth as the angle iron and waxed granite curbs we have nowadays).

But try for yourself. Put the rails on and everything will feel slick. And like Louie Barletta told us himself in one of our discussions, â€œwe here at enjoi are all about fun, fun, fun!! Caswell knows there’s nothing more fun than slappin’ on a set of enjoi tummy sticks rails and getting down with some long slick board slides!â€

We quickly caught up with enjoi rider Didrik GallasoÂ to understand why he seems to be so in love with his board rails. Slide on, k.

In most of the pics I’ve seen, you have some boards rails, do you always skate with them or is it just sometimes?
I always skate with them, never gonna take them off! I’m in love ğŸ™‚

When did you start using rails?
I think Iâ€™ve been skating rails now for around 6 months straight.

And how did you start? Tell us the story. Was it due to someone in particular, or out of curiosity or…?
I can’t really remember, but I think I just started skating them since it looked really cool and seemed like a lot of fun sliding real good and you donâ€™t really need to wax anything, you can pretty much boardslide anything ğŸ™‚

Didrik Galasso

What’s the main reason you keep skating with them now?
The main reason is that itâ€™s so much fun boardsliding with them and you can grab your board real good.

If you had to convince a kid right now to give it a try, what would you say to her/him?
That she/he is gonna have a lot of fun with them, that you can slide forever! The graphic is always fresh ğŸ™‚ And you can always take them off.

Do you get some bad jokes from other people? Like they’re laughing at you or something?
No not really, I mean they donâ€™t even know what they are missing out on!

Caswell Berry

Would you say that board rails are making a comeback? Like getting hype again?
I feel like they getting a little hype right now, I can see a lot of people are trying it out, there will always be a place for them ğŸ™‚

Thanks Deedz!
